Uses of Class
game.Field

  • Packages that use Field 
    Package Description
    game  

    • Uses of Field in game

      Methods in game that return Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field Board.getField(int i)
      Returns the Field at the given index of this Board.
      Field Board.getField(int row, int col)
      Returns the Field with the given row and column.
      Field[] Board.getFields()
      Gives the whole array of Fields on this Board.
      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Field> Board.adjacent(int row, int col)
      Gives a Set of Fields that are adjacent to the given Field.
      java.util.Set<Field> Field.getAdjacent()
      Checks which Fields are adjacent to this Field.
      Method parameters in game with type arguments of type Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Field.setAdjacent(java.util.Set<Field> fields)
      Sets which Fields are adjacent to this Field.
